segment.target: Release Notes for MBAM 1.0

segment.source: Release Notes for MBAM 1.0
segment.target: Release Notes for MBAM 1.0

segment.source: Release Notes for MBAM 1.0
segment.target: Release Notes for MBAM 1.0

segment.source: To search for a specific issue in these release notes, press CTRL+F.
segment.target: To search for a specific issue in these release notes, press CTRL+F.

segment.source: Read these release notes thoroughly before you install Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM).
segment.target: Read these release notes thoroughly before you install Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM).

segment.source: These release notes contain information that is required to successfully install MBAM.
segment.target: These release notes contain information that is required to successfully install MBAM.

segment.source: The release notes also contain information that is not available in the product documentation.
segment.target: The release notes also contain information that is not available in the product documentation.

segment.source: If there is a difference between these release notes and other MBAM documentation, the latest change should be considered authoritative.
segment.target: If there is a difference between these release notes and other MBAM documentation, the latest change should be considered authoritative.

segment.source: These release notes supersede the content that is included with this product.
segment.target: These release notes supersede the content that is included with this product.

segment.source: About the Product Documentation
segment.target: About the Product Documentation

segment.source: For information about MBAM documentation, see the MBAM home page on Microsoft TechNet.
segment.target: For information about MBAM documentation, see the MBAM home page on Microsoft TechNet.

segment.source: To obtain a downloadable copy of the MBAM documentation, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=225356 on the Microsoft Download Center.
segment.target: To obtain a downloadable copy of the MBAM documentation, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=225356 on the Microsoft Download Center.

segment.source: Provide Feedback
segment.target: Provide Feedback

segment.source: We are interested in your feedback on MBAM.
segment.target: We are interested in your feedback on MBAM.

segment.source: You can send your feedback to mdopdocs@microsoft.com.
segment.target: You can send your feedback to mdopdocs@microsoft.com.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: This email address is not a support channel, but your feedback will help us to plan for future changes in our documentation and product releases.
segment.target: This email address is not a support channel, but your feedback will help us to plan for future changes in our documentation and product releases.

segment.source: For the latest information about MDOP and additional learning resources, see the MDOP Information Experience page.
segment.target: For the latest information about MDOP and additional learning resources, see the MDOP Information Experience page.

segment.source: For more information about new updates or to provide feedback, follow us on Facebook or Twitter.
segment.target: For more information about new updates or to provide feedback, follow us on Facebook or Twitter.

segment.source: Known Issues with MBAM 1.0
segment.target: Known Issues with MBAM 1.0

segment.source: This section contains release notes about the known issues with MBAM setup and installation.
segment.target: This section contains release notes about the known issues with MBAM setup and installation.

segment.source: If you select the “Use a certificate to encrypt the network communication” option during Setup, existing database connections and dependent applications can stop functioning
segment.target: If you select the “Use a certificate to encrypt the network communication” option during Setup, existing database connections and dependent applications can stop functioning

segment.source: You can configure MBAM for Encrypted network communication after you install either the Recovery and Hardware Database or the Compliance Status Database features.
segment.target: You can configure MBAM for Encrypted network communication after you install either the Recovery and Hardware Database or the Compliance Status Database features.

segment.source: If you choose to configure MBAM for Encrypted network communication, MBAM Setup configures the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine to use Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) for communication between the applicable database and both the Administration and Monitoring Server and the Compliance and Audit Report Server features.
segment.target: If you choose to configure MBAM for Encrypted network communication, MBAM Setup configures the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine to use Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) for communication between the applicable database and both the Administration and Monitoring Server and the Compliance and Audit Report Server features.

segment.source: If the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine is not already configured to use SSL, MBAM Setup configures it to do so.
segment.target: If the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine is not already configured to use SSL, MBAM Setup configures it to do so.

segment.source: This can prevent applications that try to use non-MBAM databases on the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine from communicating with their databases.
segment.target: This can prevent applications that try to use non-MBAM databases on the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine from communicating with their databases.

segment.source: If the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine is already configured to use SSL, it is configured to use the certificate that the user selected during setup.
segment.target: If the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine is already configured to use SSL, it is configured to use the certificate that the user selected during setup.

segment.source: If this certificate differs from the one that was already in use, it can prevent applications that use SQL Server databases on the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine from running.
segment.target: If this certificate differs from the one that was already in use, it can prevent applications that use SQL Server databases on the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine from running.

segment.source: WORKAROUND: None
segment.target: WORKAROUND: None

segment.source: MBAM Setup fails during installation when you use a local Administrator account
segment.target: MBAM Setup fails during installation when you use a local Administrator account

segment.source: MBAM Setup fails when you use a local Administrator account.
segment.target: MBAM Setup fails when you use a local Administrator account.

segment.source: The log file contains the following information:
segment.target: The log file contains the following information:

segment.source: WORKAROUND: Use a domain account with administrative credentials on the server computer when you install MBAM.
segment.target: WORKAROUND: Use a domain account with administrative credentials on the server computer when you install MBAM.

segment.source: MBAM Setup reconfigures the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine to not use SSL if you select “Do not encrypt network communication”
segment.target: MBAM Setup reconfigures the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine to not use SSL if you select “Do not encrypt network communication”

segment.source: When you install either the Recovery and Hardware Database or the Compliance Status Database, you can use Setup to configure MBAM by selecting Encrypted network communication.
segment.target: When you install either the Recovery and Hardware Database or the Compliance Status Database, you can use Setup to configure MBAM by selecting Encrypted network communication.

segment.source: If you decide not to encrypt the network communication, MBAM Setup reconfigures the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine so that it does not use SSL.
segment.target: If you decide not to encrypt the network communication, MBAM Setup reconfigures the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine so that it does not use SSL.

segment.source: If the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine is already configured to use SSL, MBAM Setup disables SSL on the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine.
segment.target: If the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine is already configured to use SSL, MBAM Setup disables SSL on the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine.

segment.source: This changes the communication security between the applications that use databases that are not related to MBAM databases on the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine.
segment.target: This changes the communication security between the applications that use databases that are not related to MBAM databases on the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine.

segment.source: WORKAROUND: None
segment.target: WORKAROUND: None

segment.source: Missing prerequisite for the Internet Information Services (IIS) Management Scripts and Tools web server feature
segment.target: Missing prerequisite for the Internet Information Services (IIS) Management Scripts and Tools web server feature

segment.source: MBAM Setup is dependent on the IIS Management Scripts and Tools web server feature, but it is not an enforced prerequisite.
segment.target: MBAM Setup is dependent on the IIS Management Scripts and Tools web server feature, but it is not an enforced prerequisite.

segment.source: Server setup lets you install MBAM when this feature is missing.
segment.target: Server setup lets you install MBAM when this feature is missing.

segment.source: However, this will cause the backup service MBAM VSS Writer to start and then stop, because it cannot locate the Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) and the Internet Information Services (IIS) provider.
segment.target: However, this will cause the backup service MBAM VSS Writer to start and then stop, because it cannot locate the Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) and the Internet Information Services (IIS) provider.

segment.source: There is no error message for this condition, except that which occurs in the event log.
segment.target: There is no error message for this condition, except that which occurs in the event log.

segment.source: Installation of MBAM without IIS Management Scripts and Tools causes the backup operations not to run for MBAM.
segment.target: Installation of MBAM without IIS Management Scripts and Tools causes the backup operations not to run for MBAM.

segment.source: WORKAROUND: Ensure that the IIS Management Scripts and Tools web server feature is installed before you start the MBAM Setup.
segment.target: WORKAROUND: Ensure that the IIS Management Scripts and Tools web server feature is installed before you start the MBAM Setup.

segment.source: MBAM Setup stops responding during the “Installing selected features” phase when setup is configured to use a certificate
segment.target: MBAM Setup stops responding during the “Installing selected features” phase when setup is configured to use a certificate

segment.source: MBAM Setup stops responding during the Installing selected features phase of setup.
segment.target: MBAM Setup stops responding during the Installing selected features phase of setup.

segment.source: This occurs during the installation of the Recovery and Hardware Database or the Compliance Status Database, after you select the Use a certificate to encrypt the network communication option.
segment.target: This occurs during the installation of the Recovery and Hardware Database or the Compliance Status Database, after you select the Use a certificate to encrypt the network communication option.

segment.source: Furthermore, the MBAM Setup stops responding if the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine cannot access the certificate that was specified during setup.
segment.target: Furthermore, the MBAM Setup stops responding if the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine cannot access the certificate that was specified during setup.

segment.source: WORKAROUND: Update the permissions on the certificate, so that the Windows service for the applicable instance of the SQL Server Database Engine can access the certificate.
segment.target: WORKAROUND: Update the permissions on the certificate, so that the Windows service for the applicable instance of the SQL Server Database Engine can access the certificate.

segment.source: You can also change the account under which the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine runs, for the database engine to use the certificate.
segment.target: You can also change the account under which the instance of the SQL Server Database Engine runs, for the database engine to use the certificate.

segment.source: To determine the permissions for the certificate, type the following command at the command prompt: certutil -v -store MY
segment.target: To determine the permissions for the certificate, type the following command at the command prompt: certutil -v -store MY

segment.source: MBAM Setup pauses when you install SQL Server Reporting Services
segment.target: MBAM Setup pauses when you install SQL Server Reporting Services

segment.source: During MBAM installation, when you select an instance of SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) and SSRS instance is not available or it is configured incorrectly, the MBAM Setup might pause for up to one minute while it attempts to communicate with the SSRS instance.
segment.target: During MBAM installation, when you select an instance of SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) and SSRS instance is not available or it is configured incorrectly, the MBAM Setup might pause for up to one minute while it attempts to communicate with the SSRS instance.

segment.source: WORKAROUND: Wait for at least one minute for MBAM Setup to resume while the Setup program attempts to contact the instance of SSRS.
segment.target: WORKAROUND: Wait for at least one minute for MBAM Setup to resume while the Setup program attempts to contact the instance of SSRS.

segment.source: Administration and Monitoring Server does not run after setup
segment.target: Administration and Monitoring Server does not run after setup

segment.source: After MBAM Setup successfully installs the Administration and Monitoring Server feature, MBAM displays error messages when you try to access the MBAM administrator website.
segment.target: After MBAM Setup successfully installs the Administration and Monitoring Server feature, MBAM displays error messages when you try to access the MBAM administrator website.

segment.source: This issue occurs for one of the following reasons:
segment.target: This issue occurs for one of the following reasons:

segment.source: One or more prerequisites on the Administration and Monitoring Server were removed after the MBAM installation.
segment.target: One or more prerequisites on the Administration and Monitoring Server were removed after the MBAM installation.

segment.source: One or more prerequisites were installed on the server and later they were removed before running the MBAM Setup.
segment.target: One or more prerequisites were installed on the server and later they were removed before running the MBAM Setup.

segment.source: WORKAROUND: Review the MBAM documentation and confirm that all MBAM prerequisites are installed.
segment.target: WORKAROUND: Review the MBAM documentation and confirm that all MBAM prerequisites are installed.

segment.source: Clicking documentation links during Setup results in an application error after Setup is finished
segment.target: Clicking documentation links during Setup results in an application error after Setup is finished

segment.source: When you click a documentation link during setup and then close the Setup program by clicking Cancel or Finish after Setup has successfully finished, an application error message appears..
segment.target: When you click a documentation link during setup and then close the Setup program by clicking Cancel or Finish after Setup has successfully finished, an application error message appears..

segment.source: The problem is caused by an access violation error in the Windows Task Scheduler.
segment.target: The problem is caused by an access violation error in the Windows Task Scheduler.

segment.source: WORKAROUND: None.
segment.target: WORKAROUND: None.

segment.source: You can ignore this error.
segment.target: You can ignore this error.

segment.source: Failed MBAM Setup does not remove new databases
segment.target: Failed MBAM Setup does not remove new databases

segment.source: If the MBAM Setup fails, Setup might not remove the newly created databases.
segment.target: If the MBAM Setup fails, Setup might not remove the newly created databases.

segment.source: This can cause failures during subsequent installations.
segment.target: This can cause failures during subsequent installations.

segment.source: WORKAROUND: Choose a different name for the database instance during the subsequent installation.
segment.target: WORKAROUND: Choose a different name for the database instance during the subsequent installation.

segment.source: MBAM Setup does not recognize valid network load-balancing cluster certificates
segment.target: MBAM Setup does not recognize valid network load-balancing cluster certificates

segment.source: During the MBAM Administration and Monitoring Server installation, with the network encryption option selected, the cluster certificate is not recognized as a valid certificate.
segment.target: During the MBAM Administration and Monitoring Server installation, with the network encryption option selected, the cluster certificate is not recognized as a valid certificate.

segment.source: It is recognized as valid when the certificate for communication with the database is installed, but it is rejected for communication by the load-balancing cluster.
segment.target: It is recognized as valid when the certificate for communication with the database is installed, but it is rejected for communication by the load-balancing cluster.

segment.source: WORKAROUND: Confirm that the certificate revocation list (CRL) associated with the certificate is accessible, or use a certificate that does not require validation by using the CRL.
segment.target: WORKAROUND: Confirm that the certificate revocation list (CRL) associated with the certificate is accessible, or use a certificate that does not require validation by using the CRL.
